Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: whois
Description: Query a database for information about a domain registrant

Arguments.Name: a
Arguments.Description: Use the American Registry for Internet Numbers (ARIN) database

Arguments.Name: A
Arguments.Description: Use the Asia/Pacific Network Information Center (APNIC) database

Arguments.Name: b
Arguments.Description: Use the Network Abuse Clearinghouse database

Arguments.Name: c
Arguments.Description: Equivalent to '-h TLD.whois-servers.net', where 'TLD' is this option's argument

Arguments.Name: TLD
Arguments.Description: TLD

Arguments.Name: f
Arguments.Description: Use the African Network Information Centre (AfriNIC) database

Arguments.Name: g
Arguments.Description: Use the US non-military federal government database

Arguments.Name: h
Arguments.Description: Use the specified host instead of the default (host name or IP)

Arguments.Name: hostname
Arguments.Description: hostname

Arguments.Name: i
Arguments.Description: Use the traditional Network Information Center (InterNIC) database

Arguments.Name: I
Arguments.Description: Use the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) database

Arguments.Name: k
Arguments.Description: Use the National Internet Development Agency of Korea (KRNIC) database

Arguments.Name: l
Arguments.Description: Use the Latin American and Caribbean IP address Regional Registry (LACNIC) database

Arguments.Name: m
Arguments.Description: Use the Route Arbiter Database (RADB) database

Arguments.Name: p
Arguments.Description: Connect to the whois server on the given port

Arguments.Name: port
Arguments.Description: port

Arguments.Name: P
Arguments.Description: Use the PeeringDB database of AS numbers

Arguments.Name: Q
Arguments.Description: Do a quick lookup (don't follow referrals)

Arguments.Name: r
Arguments.Description: Use the Réseaux IP Européens (RIPE) database

Arguments.Name: R
Arguments.Description: Do a recursive lookup

Arguments.Name: S
Arguments.Description: Print the output verbatim

Arguments.Name: name
Arguments.Description: name
